Posted By: iNathan (7/25/2010 8:22:26 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
Wait . . This isn't bad . .   
You can return it whenever you cast a multicolored spell, so this can become better than [Squee, Goblin Nabob](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Squee, Goblin Nabob) in a right deck.  
Cast [Hidden Horror](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Hidden Horror) on turn three, discard Sandstorm Eidolon.  
Cast [Avatar of Discord](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Avatar of Discord) on turn four, before discarding two cards, return Sandstorm Eidolon. Discard Sandstorm Eidolon and [Fiery Temper](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Fiery Temper) Cast [Fiery Temper](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Fiery Temper) for madness cost.  
  
Of course, in most cases [Squee, Goblin Nabob](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Squee, Goblin Nabob) is better, but I think it is possible to build around her . .
posts.html:

You can return it whenever you cast a multicolored spell, so this can become better than Squee, Goblin Nabob in a right deck.
Cast Hidden Horror on turn three, discard Sandstorm Eidolon.
Cast Avatar of Discord on turn four, before discarding two cards, return Sandstorm Eidolon. Discard Sandstorm Eidolon and Fiery Temper Cast Fiery Temper for madness cost.

Of course, in most cases Squee, Goblin Nabob is better, but I think it is possible to build around her . .

posts.post_content: I keep my eyes open for new cards, hoping that someday there will be something that breaks the Eidolons. I don't expect the interaction to involve casting the actual spirits, but rather using them as discard fodder while spamming gold spells. Posted By: DaaNz (9/12/2009 11:16:13 PM)

posts.post_content:
Sexy art. But otherwise, too costly. If she had flying (like her art would indicate) or her sac ability was less limited in when you could use it and have it be useful, but as she is...
  
And Sandstorm? Does her art sugest Sandstorm in any way? I suspect her name and ability were changed after her art was commisioned, and the artist was never told of the changes. Might explain the lack of flying as well.
posts.html:

Posted By: A3Kitsune (3/18/2010 7:13:27 AM)

posts.post_content:
this should be easy: [Mercurial Chemister](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Mercurial Chemister). R, T: pitch an eidolon, 4 damage to something. play multicolored things, get your eidolons back. Pitch her again, do 4 more damage. Fun ensues.  
  
I kinda want to make an Eidolon + [Zombie Infestation](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Zombie Infestation) deck where infestation is the only monocolored card. Black has some fun multicolored cards. [Lotleth Troll](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Lotleth Troll), [putrefy](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=putrefy), and [Slitherhead](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Slitherhead) come to mind, just off the top of my head.
posts.html:
